awakenings.effect: At the start of battle, the first use of a Ultimate Skill does not consume energy.
When your ultimate skill hits an enemy, it inflicts [Flame Pressure], reducing the enemy's attack power by 35% for 3 seconds.
[Normal Attack], [Skill], [ULT] and [Passive] level and level cap +2.
[Normal Attack], [Skill], [ULT] and [Passive] level and level cap +2.
Targets affected by ultimate skills have their all resistances reduced by an additional 20% for 5 sec.

damageAnalysis.description: Ibaraki-doji has alot of damage taken debuffs, however she need alot of investment to be effective. like full dupe and memory, and the damage difference between her and Buffer is like 60% to 80% at best.
damageAnalysis.title: Total Damage Taken Debuffs

totals.label: Ultimate Skill Damage Taken
totals.note: Nearly triples damage from teammate ultimates

effects: When a Ultimate Skill deals damage, the target takes 36% more damage and receives 40% less healing for 5 seconds
memoryCard.name: A Perfect Makeup Look?

auto.description: Deals fire damage equal to 244.3% of attack power to the target and a 4-meter radius, and applies 1 stack of [Curse Covenant], reducing energy gain efficiency by 35.8% and increasing damage taken by 38.6% for 10 seconds.
auto.name: Arrow of the Curse

normal.description: Deals 120% of attack power as fiery damage to the designated enemy unit.
normal.name: Flame Arrow

passive.description: All attacks inflict [Eviscerate] upon damaging enemies, increasing damage taken from ultimate skills by 3.6%, up to 10 stacks, lasting 5 seconds.
passive.name: Deboning

ultimate.description: Unleashes a Fire Phoenix in the direction of the enemy target, dealing 360% fire damage to all enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the damage will be inflicted with 1 stack of [Flame Curse], increasing their damage taken from ultimate skills by 87.9% for 10 seconds. This damage can [Interrupt] any skill being cast by the target.
ultimate.name: Fire Phoenix Curse

teamSkill.description: After battle starts, reduces total damage dealt by all enemy units by 2.5%. For every 1000 Attack Power, the effect increases by 100%, up to a maximum of 300%.
teamSkill.name: Combo Skill
